item.title: Wayland Baptist University
item.description: Christian Colleges, Christian Colleges And Universities - A coeducational, multipurpose, Southern Baptist affiliated university located in Plainview, TX, Albuquerque, NM, Altus,OK, Amarillo, TX, Anchorage, AK, Clovis,NM, Fairbanks, AK, Lubbock, TX, Kenya, Phoenix, AZ, San Antonio, TX, Sierra Vista, AZ, Tucson, AZ, and Wichita Falls, TX. Enrollment of about 6,000.
